```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

## Required Libraries
``` {r library}
library(tidyverse)
```

## Header

``` {r read-file}
df <- read_csv('wide_airline_data.csv')
```

``` {r rename-columns}
df <- df %>% 
  rename(carrier = 1,
         status = 2)
df
```

## Header 2

``` {r remove-na}
# remove rows where ALL columns 'N/A'
df <- df %>% 
  filter(if_any(everything(), ~ !is.na(.)))
df
```

``` {r ffill-airline}
# remove rows where ALL columns 'N/A'
df <- df %>% 
  fill(carrier)
df
```


``` {r melt}
# remove rows where ALL columns 'N/A'
df <- df %>% 
  gather("city", "flight_count", -c("carrier", "status"))
df
```
